short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you get Plant Spec from MITTAPP based on SH

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi All,

By using this Chrome Extension, you can easily check your Plant Spec from Sitehandler Page.

This is third-party self development tools from MITT Team (EID). Hopefully you can use it wisely.

If you have any problem for installation, please contact me :
- kuncoro.wicaksono.adi.baroto@gmail.com


Regards,
Kuncoro Wicaksono
